subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer’s chance to equal Bjorn Borg’s Wimbledon record of five consecutive titles will come Sunday against No. 2 Rafael Nadal, Federer’s chief rival.
snippet: Roger Federer’s chance to equal Bjorn Borg’s Wimbledon record of five consecutive titles will come Sunday against No. 2 Rafael Nadal, Federer’s chief rival.
